meanings.definition: A substance used to give flavor to food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The chef added various flavorings to the soup to make it taste better.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the different flavorings in the cake - vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry.
meanings.sent3: The flavorings in the salad danced on my taste buds like a party!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a mix of different flavorings, bringing joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the flavorings filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The characteristic taste of a food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The flavorings of the curry were a perfect blend of spices and herbs.
meanings.sent2: I love the flavorings of fresh strawberries in the smoothie.
meanings.sent3: The flavorings of the pizza made my taste buds do a happy dance.
meanings.sent4: His words had the flavorings of sincerity and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The flavorings of nostalgia in the dish reminded me of my childhood.
